if alsa is listed as the output plugin then click configure

try the pci ones

like a few months ago my kid sister sent like 20 print jobs to the network printer (which is in my room) and considering it was 8 am on a sunday i was still sleeping i jumped outta bed and unpluged the printer. well as far as i can figure the core printer files got corrupted. which made my comp crash when ANY printer was connected to the computer
